scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/nodejs && cp package.json dist/nodejs && cd dist/nodejs && npm install --production && cd .. && zip -r /tmp/playwright-lambda-layer.zip nodejs
scripts.deploy: aws s3 cp /tmp/playwright-lambda-layer.zip s3://lambda-layers-ebay/playwright-lambda-layers.zip && aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name 'playwright-lambda-layer' --description 'NodeJS module of playwright library' --license-info 'MIT' --compatible-runtimes 'nodejs14.x' --content S3Bucket=lambda-layers-ebay,S3Key=playwright-lambda-layer.zip
